author: NTrevisani
body:
#### PR description:

Introducing the possibility of requiring selections on the number of valid pixel hits, tracker layers with measurements, and valid muons hits in HLTMuonPointingFilter.cc.

#### PR validation:

Run the module (cmsDriver.py and cmsRun) with the cosmicSPSkim_cff.py configuration: comparing the new code with the same requirements as the old one and with additional selections.
title: Cosmic sps
